Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat. The townspeople form a posse to destroy the animal, and things seem to be just fine. Well, until they find that one cat has been turned into an unstoppable killing machine, and is preying upon the residents of the town.
